hypotheses.title: Implement CI/CD Test Coverage Tracking
hypotheses.description: Introduce a reporting tool in CI/CD pipelines to track Python file test coverage.

hypotheses.title: Add Command Line Progress Indicator
hypotheses.description: Enhance script output for longer-running commands with progress indicators.

hypotheses.title: Enable Detailed Logging in CI/CD
hypotheses.description: Augment logging levels for debugging purposes within the build pipeline.

parsed.rationale: Adding a progress indicator to command line scripts (H3) addresses UX/UI concerns, offers end users valuable insights during lengthy tasks and improves interaction while being low-risk.

raw_summary:
Based on the lack of Python files or workflow configurations in the repository, here are three diverse hypotheses across different axes:

```json
{
  "hypotheses": [
    {
      "id": "H2",
      "title": "Implement CI/CD Test Coverage Tracking",
      "axis": "test_coverage",
      "description": "Introduce a reporting tool in CI/CD pipelines to track Python file test coverage.",
      "files_to_change": ["coverage.ini", ".github/workflows/python_tests.yml"],
      "estimated_value": 7,
      "estimated_risk": 3,
      "net_score": 4
    },
    {
      "id": "H3",
      "title": "Add Command Line Progress Indicator",
      "axis": "ux_cli",
      "description": "Enhance script output for longer-running commands with progress indicators.",
      "files_to_change": ["hooks/*"],
      "estimated_value": 6,
      "estimated_risk": 2,
      "net_score": 4
    },
    {
      "id": "H4",
      "title": "Enable Detailed Logging in CI/CD",
      "axis": "observability",
      "description": "Augment logging levels for debugging purposes within the build pipeline.",
      "files_to_change": [".github/workflows/*.yml"],
      "estimated_value": 5,
      "estimated_risk": 2,
      "net_score": 3
    }
  ],
  "selected": "H3",
  "rationale": "Adding a progress indicator to command line scripts (H3) addresses UX/UI concerns, offers end users valuable insights during lengthy tasks and improves interaction while being low-risk."
}
```
